				[1616] heading 'Product Description'
				[1623] image 'DIY Digital Night Vision Scope for Rifle Hunting', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/c7e0208d-4c63-40c5-ba82-1f4e56e12b98.__CR0,0,970,600_PT0_SX970_V1___.jpg'
				[1625] heading 'BHNDOING DIY Night Vision Scope for riflescopes'
				[1626] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'BHNDOING DIY Night Vision is a light weight rear mounted night vision add on that allows you to quickly and easily convert your day scope into a state of the art night vision rifle scope for close and long range hunting day or night.'
				[1627] paragraph ''
					StaticText '720P HD colour Day-time and 720P HD Night-time.'
				[1628] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Please kindly note:'
				[1629] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'The BHNDOING night vision scope is not scope;Rather, it is a system that you can use with your rifle scope as a night sighting system.'
				[1630] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'There are separate parts that, when combined, create a complete system you can attach to your scope.'
				[1636] heading 'Features of Night Vision Scope for riflescopes'

					[1638] rowgroup ''
						[1639] row ''
							[1640] columnheader 'HD camera'
								[1642] paragraph ''
									[1643] image 'HD camera', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/49bb053c-0540-41af-b1f9-6bd19ebc93f5.__CR0,0,500,500_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
							[1645] columnheader 'IR Illuminator'
								[1647] paragraph ''
									[1648] image 'IR Illuminator', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/46f0e723-69b6-48c8-8e8b-0b815b754c9a.__CR0,0,500,500_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
							[1650] columnheader "5'' protable display screen"
								[1652] paragraph ''
									[1653] image "5'' protable display screen", url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/680f545b-ecdb-4f51-8bc8-225ca4862f33.__CR0,0,500,500_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'
						[1655] row ''
							[1656] cell 'Higher Definition Camera Lens BHNDOING Night Vision for Rifle Scope the effective range is about 200 yards, which will greatly improve your hunting range at night.'
								[1658] heading 'Higher Definition Camera Lens'
								[1659] paragraph ''
									StaticText 'BHNDOING Night Vision for Rifle Scope the effective range is about 200 yards, which will greatly improve your hunting range at night.'
							[1660] cell '5W extended sliding infrared flashlight Independent infrared illuminator system, support Zoom in/Zoom out, with infrared illuminator mount. 5W 850nm laser IR with bigger zoom area.'
								[1662] heading '5W extended sliding infrared flashlight'
								[1663] paragraph ''
									StaticText 'Independent infrared illuminator system, support Zoom in/Zoom out, with infrared illuminator mount. 5W 850nm laser IR with bigger zoom area.'
							[1664] cell 'Larger and Clearer LCD Screen 5.0 inches clear display screen captures, Larger Dispaly make more confortable and clearer for your view in complete darkness.'
								[1666] heading 'Larger and Clearer LCD Screen'

				[1690] image 'DIY Night Vision for Rifle Scope', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/71eccd9d-1731-4e05-9538-3157f9a4d1e5.__CR0,0,970,600_PT0_SX970_V1___.jpg'
				[1699] image 'Night Vision Scope for riflescopes', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/a7b19bb8-eef9-4125-8631-034f694cb089.__CR0,0,300,400_PT0_SX300_V1___.jpg'

						StaticText '【HD viewing & High Quality Night Captures】BHNDOING Night Vision for Rifle Scope is equipped with 5-inches screen offers Hunting Night Vision Scopes a bright and clear view，the effective range is about 200 yards, which will greatly improve your hunting range at night.'
					[1741] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText '【Day and Night】The product has day and night modes to choose, please make sure that the appropriate modes are selected. The monitor has an extendable cable for easy viewing of targets in different positions or situations.'

						ListMarker '•'

						StaticText '【Easy to install】Easy to install and use, Can be assembled quickly by detailed instructions for a few minutes. The adapter is suitable for most scopes.Please note that the monitor and the illuminator require batteries (18mm*67mm).'

step_data.thought: I'm now on the product page for the BHNDOING DIY Night Vision Scope. I can see the price is clearly displayed as '$99.99' on the page. For the rating, I can see a link that says 'Be the first to review this product', which indicates that this product doesn't have any ratings yet. Since there are no reviews, the product has no rating score. I've now found both pieces of information requested: the price is $99.99, and the product has no ratings yet (as indicated by the 'Be the first to review this product' text). I should send a message to the user with this information.
step_data.action: stop('The BHNDOING DIY Night Vision Scope is priced at $99.99. The product currently has no ratings, as indicated by the "Be the first to review this product" link on the page.')
